task.title: Create a new TestOps release linked to a Jira release

taskbody.context: To create a new embedded Jira release in , do as follows:

step.cmd: Click on the Create Release button at the top right corner.
step.info: Once you have enabled Jira integration in , the Jira Project and Jira Release sections are added in the Create Release page.

step.cmd: Select your Jira project and Jira release in the dropdown menu, then click Create.

taskbody.result: Once created successfully, you can see the linked Jira release status next to the name of the newly created TestOps release. You can now link your test runs to this release.
